title: What Katsina govt is doing to strengthen Primary Healthcare - Commissioner
description: Mr Funtua said the current administration is prioritising infrastructure upgrades, workforce expansion and community-centred service delivery as part of its 2026 health financing commitments.
content: At the 2025 National Health Dialogue held in Abuja on Thursday, the Katsina State Commissioner for Health, Musa Funtua, outlined the state governments renewed efforts to strengthen Primary Healthcare… [+4311 chars]
